name: stationery
description: Compose letters at the command line.

scripts.start: node ./bin/index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. -- Don John
scripts.formal: node ./bin/index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. --tpl ./formal.mustache -- Benedick
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Graham Marlow
